sect2.title: Zend_Application_Resource_Db
sect2.para: Zend_Application_Resource_Db will initialize a Zend_Db adapter based on the options passed to it. By default, it also sets the adapter as the default adapter for use with Zend_Db_Table.
The following configuration keys are recognized:

listitem.para: params: associative array of configuration parameters to use when retrieving the adapter instance.
isDefaultTableAdapter: whether or not to establish this adapter as the default table adapter.

example.title: Sample DB adapter resource configuration
example.para: Below is an example INI configuration that can be used to initialize the DB resource.
example.programlisting: [production] resources.db.adapter = "pdo_mysql" resources.db.params.host = "localhost" resources.db.params.username = "webuser" resources.db.params.password = "XXXXXXX" resources.db.params.dbname = "test" resources.db.isDefaultTableAdapter = true
